body:
The best approach in my opinion is to use HtmlAgilityPack.

By using this tool you can load an manage the whole rendered page very easily. 

private HtmlDocument GetDocument(string url)
{
    HtmlWeb page = new HtmlWeb();

    return page.Load(url);
}

This will return an object which represents the different parts of the html. For instance, if you want to get the header of the page, then you do:

string header = document.DocumentNode.SelectSingleNode("//header").OuterHtml;

Hope it helps!
title: Kentico: Retrieving the rendered content of a page programmatically
